          <title>
            <string language="en">Longitudinal waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Längswellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues longitudinales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas longitudinais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde longitudinali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαμήκη κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas longitudinales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a set-up for making longitudinal waves on a slinky spring using an oscillator.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">oscillator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">signal generator</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">slinky spring</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Installation für das 
Bilden der Längswellen auf einem schleichenden Frühling mit einem 
Oszillator.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre une installation pour 
faire les vagues longitudinales un ressort furtif à l'aide d'un 
oscillateur.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma instalação para 
fazer ondas longitudinais em uma mola slinky usando um oscilador.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra una messa a punto per
fare le onde longitudinali su una molla slinky per mezzo di un 
oscillatore.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει μια οργάνωση για την 
παραγωγή των διαμήκων κυμάτων σε ένα κρυψίνους ελατήριο 
χρησιμοποιώντας έναν ταλαντωτή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una disposición para 
hacer ondas longitudinales en un resorte slinky usando un oscilador.</string>
          </description>
